text: @TomFitton @StacyLStiles @DisrnNews Think the average death per state is roughly 4500 monthly but now add on coronavirus deaths n that’ll add up to roughly 15,000 total deaths in say New York, when numbers comes out we’ll see how accurate death toll numbers are !

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
